job_history.work_description: Assure the timely and accurate preparation and completion of payroll functions in conjunction with Human Resources, prepare and post monthly journal entries to the GL. Track accounting for state contract funds. Prepare monthly and quarterly state reports. Assure input of the daily receipts and reconciliation. Assure accurate record keeping of fixed asset purchases. Responsible for overseeing the inventory control process for the agency. Assure accurate monthly completion of all reports for the annual audit process. Prepare and process vouchers for city/county funding accounts receivable and maintain spreadsheets of transactions. Backup for Accounts Payable Specialist and Accounts Receivable Specialist. Serve as the primary trainer for the finance function of the clinical records systems.

Full charge bookkeeping for several companies, including accounts payable and receivable, all functions of payroll including all IRS reporting, depositing funds that also included keeping and coding deposits, bank reconciliations, any and all secretarial duties.
Full charge bookkeeping, including accounts payable and receivable, all functions of payroll including all IRS reporting, depositing funds, any and all secretarial duties, inventory of all chemicals.

Title agent duties include research and data entry for compilation of a Listing/Title Commitment. Entering data on FAST software system, any and all secretarial duties, entering and verifying batched data from the courthouse of recorded documents. Escrow agent duties include communication between all parties involved in the process of escrow, preparing HUD1 Settlement Statements, ordering deeds and finishing all loan docs.

Full charge bookkeeping for several LLC ventures, including accounts payable and receivable, all functions of payroll including all IRS reporting, depositing funds that also included keeping track of mineral checks and coding deposits as gross revenue less taxes, bank reconciliations, any and all secretarial duties, creating ads for real estate listings focusing great attention to RESPA guidelines, photography for ads, entering listings to the MLS system, writing real estate contracts and keeping up with all due diligence dates making sure all are abided by with follow-up actions through the entire transaction until closing, overseeing and representing East Slope Properties in all closings at the Title Company.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll functions consistently across multiple roles, including all IRS reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 25 years of experience with all aspects of accounting, including accounts payable and receivable, bank reconciliations, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Prepared and posted monthly journal entries, tracked accounting for state contract funds, and prepared monthly and quarterly state reports, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Overseen inventory control process for the agency, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Bookkeeping
skills.explanation: Handled full charge bookkeeping for multiple companies, including all functions of payroll, accounts payable and receivable, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Bank Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Handled bank reconciliations consistently across multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounts Payable and Receivable
skills.explanation: Handled accounts payable and receivable functions consistently across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Prepared and analyzed financial reports, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and payroll, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Served as the primary trainer for the finance function of the clinical records systems, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Real Estate
skills.explanation: Handled real estate sales and closings, including creating ads, entering listings to the MLS system, and writing real estate contracts, indicating a solid working proficiency.
